meta_description: The Durango Arts Center is a hub for performing and visual arts in Durango, Colorado. Live shows, arts education, art exhibits, and more!
admission_text:
# Durango Arts Repertory Theater (DART)

## Community theater. National reputation.

The Durango Arts Repertory Theater (DART) inspires audiences and actors by uniting the forces of creativity, collaboration and community. DART presents 4-5 major productions annually, including an adult contemporary play, a summer musical theatre spectacular, a 10-Minute Play Festival, and a family holiday show featuring students in the Youth Theater program. Beloved favorites, compelling dramas, inventive works by emerging playwrights, and family theater combine for a season that entertains, challenges, and represents the best in local talent. The DAC Youth Theatre program also presents a number of family-friendly shows throughout the year, including a Kids Follies event during the annual Snowdown Festival. 

[ UPCOMING DART AUDITIONS > ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116200743/https://durangoarts.org/performing-arts/dart-auditions/)

## The 2026 DART Season will be announced shortly!
